descriptions.overview:
1 King Bed

452 sq feet


Internet - Free WiFi

Entertainment - 40-inch Smart TV with premium channels

Food & Drink - Coffee/tea maker, minibar (fees may apply), and free bottled water

Sleep - Premium bedding, blackout drapes/curtains, turndown service, and bed sheets

Bathroom - Private bathroom, deep soaking bathtub, and separate shower with a rainfall showerhead

Practical - Safe, iron/ironing board, and phone; rollaway/extra beds and free cribs/infant beds available on request

Comfort - Fresh bed sheets (on request), fresh towels (on request), and air conditioning

Non-Smoking

fees.optional:
• Fee for buffet breakfast: approximately IDR 372680 for adults and IDR 186340 for children
  • Airport shuttle fee: IDR 896000 per vehicle (one-way, maximum occupancy 2)
  • Early check-in fee: 100 percent of room rate (subject to availability)
  • Late check-out fee: 100 percent of room rate (subject to availability)
  • Rollaway bed fee: IDR 1210000.0 per night

The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change.

checkin.instructions:
• Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy
  • Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges
  • Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed
  • This property accepts credit cards, debit cards, and cash
  • Cashless transactions are available
  • Noise-free guestrooms cannot be guaranteed
  • This property affirms that it follows the cleaning and disinfection practices of Covid-19 Update (Langham Hotels)
checkin.special_instructions: This property offers transfers from the airport (surcharges may apply). Guests must contact the property with arrival details before travel, using the contact information on the booking confirmation. Guests will receive an email 24 hours before arrival with check-in instructions. Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival.

policies.know_before_you_go:
• Pool access available from 6:00 AM to 9:00 PM.
  • Reservations are required for massage services and spa treatments. Reservations can be made by contacting the hotel prior to arrival, using the contact information on the booking confirmation.
  • No pets and no service animals are allowed at this property.
  • This property advises that enhanced cleaning and guest safety measures are currently in place.
  • The property is cleaned and disinfected using an electrostatic sprayer; disinfectant is used to clean the property; commonly-touched surfaces are cleaned with disinfectant between stays; bed sheets and towels are laundered at a temperature of at least 60C/140F.
  • Personal protective equipment, including masks, will be available to guests.
  • Social distancing measures are in place; staff at the property wear personal protective equipment; a shield is in place between staff and guests in main contact areas; periodic temperature checks are conducted on staff; temperature checks are available to guests; guests are provided with hand sanitizer; cashless payment methods are available for all transactions; masks are required in public areas.
  • Contactless check-in and contactless check-out are available.
  • On-site PCR COVID-19 testing is available for a IDR 1000000 fee, and antigen/rapid COVID-19 testing is available for a IDR 250000 fee; reservations are required for on-site testing.
  • This property affirms that it adheres to the cleaning and disinfection practices of COVID-19 Guidelines (WHO).

descriptions.rooms: Make yourself at home in one of the 224 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and Smart televisions. Complimentary wireless internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature deep soaking bathtubs and rainfall showerheads. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and coffee/tea makers.
descriptions.dining: Satisfy your appetite with international cuisine at ALICE, one of the hotel's 4 restaurants. Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 2 bars/lounges. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 6:30 AM to 10:30 AM for a fee.
descriptions.headline: In Jakarta (Senayan)
descriptions.location: With a stay at The Langham, Jakarta in Jakarta (Senayan), you'll be within a 5-minute drive of ASHTA District 8 and Plaza Senayan.  This luxury hotel is 2.7 mi (4.4 km) from Gelora Bung Karno Stadium and 3.8 mi (6 km) from Bundaran HI.
descriptions.amenities: Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, including an outdoor pool, an indoor pool, and a 24-hour fitness center. Additional amenities at this hotel include complimentary wireless internet access, concierge services, and babysitting (surcharge).
descriptions.attractions:
Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Kidzania - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
ASHTA District 8 - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Pacific Place - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Indonesia Stock Exchange - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
FX Sudirman Mall - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Plaza Senayan - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Golden Triangle - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Gelora Bung Karno Stadium - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Senayan City - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Plaza Semanggi - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Senayan National Golf Club - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Balai Sidang Jakarta Convention Center - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Embassy of Canada - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Jakarta World Trade Center - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Lotte Shopping Avenue - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi

The nearest airports are:
Halim Perdanakusuma Intl. Airport (HLP) - 13.3 km / 8.2 mi
Soekarno-Hatta Intl. Airport (CGK) - 31.4 km / 19.5 mi

The preferred airport for The Langham, Jakarta is Soekarno-Hatta Intl. Airport (CGK).
descriptions.business_amenities: Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Planning an event in Jakarta? This hotel has 22604 square feet (2100 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and 10 meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite.

Pets.rule: No pets allowed, no service animals permitted

CheckIn.rule: Check-in start time: 3:00 PM; Check in end time: anytime
